Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #29 State bus or the #3 King Drive bus. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
